# MPU6050 Module #

## Hardware Equipment:

- Raspberry Pi 5 board
- Power adapter
- 40-pin ribbon cable
- MPU6050 Sensor
- Jumpers

## Circuit Diagram:
![Circuit_Diagram](https://github.com/Harveychen2004/Raspberry_Pi_5_suit/blob/48e38f95f79364153d70dfba27fb183b066eee14/MPU6050%20module/Circuit_Diagram.jpg)
